sentences.en: a highly controversial (= very controversial ) plan to flood the valley in order to build a dam
sentences.cn: 一个把山谷淹掉来建造水坝的极具争议的计划

sentences.en: Both sides had agreed to use neutral terms in their references to each other, avoiding controversial ones.
sentences.cn: 双方已达成协议，在提及对方时使用中性的词语，避免有争议的字眼。

sentences.en: Controversial energy measures are slated for Senate debate within days.
sentences.cn: 几项颇受争议的能源措施定于几天后提交参议院讨论。

sentences.en: He is a controversial figure (= person who does controversial things ) in the art world.
sentences.cn: 他是艺术界极具争议的人物。

sentences.en: It was an eventful and controversial race.
sentences.cn: 那是一场充满变数而且颇具争议的比赛。

sentences.en: She's not feminist with a capital F but she's fairly controversial.
sentences.cn: 她不是个真正意义上的女权主义者，但却是个颇具争议的人物。

sentences.en: The candidate tried to run away from controversial issues by pretending to be ill.
sentences.cn: 这位候选人佯装生病,以回避参与一些争论性的问题.

sentences.en: The changes are bound to be controversial.
sentences.cn: 这些变化注定会引起争议。

sentences.en: The controversial experiment involved secretly filming a group of children.
sentences.cn: 那个有争议的试验涉及对一群儿童的秘密拍摄.

sentences.en: the controversial issue of welfare reform
sentences.cn: 福利改革这一有争议的话题

sentences.en: The distinction between craft and fine art is more controversial.
sentences.cn: 对手工艺和美术之间的差别争议更大。

sentences.en: The issue is unresolved and certain to remain controversial.
sentences.cn: 结论尚未达成,显然还将继续争议.

sentences.en: The purpose of the journey is to mobilise public opinion on the controversial issue.
sentences.cn: 此行的目的就是动员公众对这个备受争议的问题发表意见。

sentences.en: The topic of argument is controversial.
sentences.cn: 这个议题是很有争议的.

sentences.en: These tracks were calculated to be controversial and attract attention to the album.
sentences.cn: 这些曲子意在引起争议，吸引人们关注这张专辑。

sentences.en: They can see themselves going out on a limb, voting for a very controversial energy bill.
sentences.cn: 他们可以预见到要是给极具争议性的能源法案投赞成票，可能会陷入孤立。

sentences.en: This has become one of the most controversial topics of our time.
sentences.cn: 这个问题已成为现今最受争议的话题之一.

words.tran_cn: 颇有争议地；引起争议地

trans.tran_en: causing a lot of disagreement, because many people have strong opinions about the subject being discussed
